descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Wear Face for Moto 360 is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
With a beautiful design and awesome colors, our latest Watch Face will definitely be your favorite one . Download now Wear Face for Moto 360 and enjoy the best experience.
How to setup Wear Face for Moto 360:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Wear Face for Moto 360.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Wear Face for Moto 360 app settings menu.
Wear Face for Moto 360 is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Please fix the alignment issue with moto 360 lollipop 5.1.1 and I'll give you 5 stars..I love the design
No offset on my updated moto 360 love the color effect choices.
Amin ahwazi نصب شد ولی نمیتونم پیداش کنم
Face is off set on moto360 after 5.1.1 Update
recentChanges: Updated to support Moto 360 ambidextrous feature.
